body_html:
I'm not sure which is better for apaszke's solution, although they would both work.

Adding .double() to the model or float() to the input. Would the latter slow batching down significantly?

But then again, I'm sure if I add .double() to the model, at some point I'll have to add .double() to the input.
body_text:
I'm not sure which is better for apaszke's solution, although they would both work.
Adding .double() to the model or float() to the input. Would the latter slow batching down significantly?
But then again, I'm sure if I add .double() to the model, at some point I'll have to add .double() to the input.
body:
I'm not sure which is better for apaszke's solution, although they would both work.

Adding `.double()` to the model or `float()` to the input. Would the latter slow batching down significantly?

But then again, I'm sure if I add `.double()` to the model, at some point I'll have to add `.double()` to the input.
